name: True Polymorph
oracle_text: Target artifact or creature becomes a copy of another target artifact or creature.
flavor_text: Maybe a little *too* convincing.

name: True Polymorph
oracle_text: Target artifact or creature becomes a copy of another target artifact or creature.

name: Grand Master of Flowers
oracle_text:
As long as Grand Master of Flowers has seven or more loyalty counters on him, he's a 7/7 Dragon God creature with flying and indestructible.
+1: Target creature without first strike, double strike, or vigilance can't attack or block until your next turn.
+1: Search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Monk of the Open Hand, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

oracle_text:

name: Monk of the Open Hand
oracle_text: Flurry of Blows — Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Monk of the Open Hand.
flavor_text: His mind is a tranquil meadow, his fists a raging storm.

name: White Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
Cold Breath — When White Dragon enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: White dragons are unparalleled hunters, keenly focused on slaughtering their enemies.

name: White Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
Cold Breath — When White Dragon enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

name: Rust Monster
oracle_text:
First strike
Sacrifice an artifact: Rust Monster gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"They don't seem scary, but then you're suddenly standing there in your underclothes without a weapon. Then everything looks like a threat."
—Jarro, battle master

name: Divine Smite
oracle_text: Target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls phases out. If that permanent is black, exile it instead. (If it phases out, treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)
flavor_text: "When darkness closes in around us, my blade will light our path."

name: Ray of Enfeeblement
oracle_text: Target creature gets -4/-1 until end of turn. If that creature is white, it gets -4/-4 until end of turn instead.
flavor_text: Erigan cried out in pain as a hideous weakness settled into his bones.

name: Wild Shape
oracle_text:
Choose one. Until end of turn, target creature you control has that base power and toughness, becomes that creature type, and gains that ability.
• 1/3 Turtle with hexproof.
• 1/5 Spider with reach.
• 3/3 Elephant with trample.

name: Mordenkainen
oracle_text:
+2: Draw two cards, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.
−2: Create a blue Dog Illusion creature token with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to twice the number of cards in your hand."
−10: Exchange your hand and library, then shuffle. You get an emblem with "You have no maximum hand size."

name: Plate Armor
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +3/+3 and has ward {1}. (Whenever equipped creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)
Equip {3}. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each other Equipment you control.

name: Eyes of the Beholder
oracle_text: Target creature gets -11/-11 until end of turn.
flavor_text: In the end, there was nothing beautiful to be seen.

oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Flying, haste

name: Eye of Vecna
oracle_text:
When Eye of Vecna enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 2 life.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {2}. If you do, you draw a card and you lose 2 life.
flavor_text: "I see all things as they truly are! I see . . . decay in all flesh, and betrayal in every heart."

name: Hand of Vecna
Check for Traps
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You. choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card. If an instant or a card with flash is exiled this way, they lose 1 life. Otherwise, you lose 1 life.

name: "Circle of the Moon Druid"
oracle_text: Bear Shape — As long as its your turn, "Circle of the Moon Druid" is a Bear with base power and toughness 4/2. (It loses all other creature types.)

name: Vampire Spawn
oracle_text: When Vampire Spawn enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Unsuccessful vampire hunters often wind up as ravenous spawn.

name: "Hydra Nest"
oracle_text:
If you control two or more other lands, "Hydra Nest" enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
{X}{G}: "Hydra Nest" becomes an X/X green Hydra creature until end of turn. It's still a land. X can't be 0.

name: "Hydra Nest"
oracle_text:
If you control two or more other lands, "Hydra Nest" enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
{X}{G}: "Hydra Nest" becomes an X/X green Hydra creature until end of turn. It's still a land. X can't be 0.

name: "Acererak"
oracle_text:
When "Acererak" enters the battlefield, if you have not completed the dungeon Tomb of Annihilation, return "Acererak" to its owner's hand and venture into the dungeon.
Whenever "Acererak" attacks, for each opponent, you create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token unless that player sacrifices a creature.

name: Skeletal Swarming
oracle_text:
Each Skeleton you control has trample, attacks each combat if able, and gets +X/+0, where X is the number of other Skeletons you control.
At the beginning of your end step, create a tapped 1/1 black Skeleton creature token. If a creature died this turn, create two of those tokens instead.

name: Long Rest
oracle_text: Return X target cards with different mana values from your graveyard to your hand. If eight or more cards were returned to your hand this way, your life total becomes equal to your starting life total. Exile Long Rest.
flavor_text: A job well done means a rest well earned.

name: Long Rest
oracle_text: Return X target cards with different mana values from your graveyard to your hand. If eight or more cards were returned to your hand this way, your life total becomes equal to your starting life total. Exile Long Rest.

name: Sudden Insight
oracle_text: Draw a card for each different mana value among nonland cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text: A lucky draw from the Deck of Many Things gave Voltusk an inexplicable flash of understanding that he spent the rest of his life trying to repeat.

name: Burning Hands
oracle_text: Burning Hands deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If that permanent is green, Burning Hands deals 6 damage instead.
flavor_text: A simple fire spell that grows in intensity along with its caster.

name: Rally Maneuver
oracle_text: Target creature get +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Up to one other target creature gets +0/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Don't give up! You are steel and fire, and victory is yours to seize."

name: Unexpected Windfall
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards and create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: Fortune favors the fortunate.

name: Spoils of the Hunt
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each mana from a Treasure that was spent to cast this spell. Then that creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.
flavor_text: "Every coin helps rebuild the town they destroyed."

name: Potion of Healing
oracle_text:
When Potion of Healing enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Potion of Healing: You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Magic can knit the body back together, but the courage to fight on comes only from within.

name: Forsworn Paladin
oracle_text:
Menace
{1}{B}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a Treasure token.
{2}{B}: Target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn. If mana from a Treasure was spent to activate this ability, that creature also gains deathtouch until end of turn.

name: Demogorgon's Clutches
oracle_text: Target opponent dsicards two cards, mills two cards, and loses 2 life. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
flavor_text: The good will be corrupted, the kind will be devoured, and all will be dragged into the bottomless Abyss.

name: "Hob Boss"
oracle_text:
Other Goblins you control get +1/+1.
{R}, {T}: "Hob Boss" deals damage to any target equal to the number of Goblins that entered the battlefield under your control this turn.

name: Soulknife Spy
oracle_text: Whenever Soulknife Spy deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor_text: My psychic blade cuts the mind and severs thoughts. Even if you survive, you'll never remember I was here.

name: Teleportation Circle
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target artifact or creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
flavor_text:
"Hold on to your lunch!"
—Bartleby, gnome wizard

name: Teleportation Circle
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target artifact or creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

1-9 | Draw a card.
10-20 | Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Scaled Herbalist
oracle_text: {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: "I could help you, or I could eat you for lunch,. I haven't decided yet."
